desc: The latest Apple iPad Air 5th Gen features an all-screen design. This Space Grey color iPad Air has a 10.9-inch (2360x1640) LED‑backlit Multi‑Touch Liquid Retina display. The 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display features advanced technologies like True Tone, P3 wide color, and an anti‑reflective coating.
With a slim profile this TV blends seamlessly into your living space. It’s perfect for wall mounting while its discreet, narrow bezel puts your focus firmly on the picture, not the frame.

The Canon EOS M50 Mark II Mirrorless Camera comes with a 15-45 Lens. It is fun and easy to use with Wi-Fi connectivity for content creators to stay close to their audience at all times. Keep your social media feeds lit with high-quality visual storytelling in 4K and accurate eye and face detection autofocusing.

productName: HP 14s-dq4458TU Core i5 11th Gen 14-Inch FHD Laptop
desc: The HP 14s-dq4458TU Laptop featured with Intel Core i5-1155G7 Processor (8M Cache, 2.50 GHz up to 4.50 GHz) and Intel Iris Xe Graphics. This Laptop is powered by 8 GB DDR4-3200 MHz RAM (2 x 4 GB) with 512 GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD Storage.

The new Apple Watch SE (MYDT2LL/A) GPS 44mm Sport Band (Space Gray Aluminum) comes with bright screen and LTPO OLED Retina Display. This Apple Watch SE featured with fitness metrics, health stats, and mobile notifications.

Apple Studio Display is a 27" 5K Monitor from the brand Apple. The Studio Display has a slim, all-screen design. And it’s packed with a phenomenal set of features so everything you do springs to life with gorgeous color and spectacular detail.
